# Autonomist Republican Union Party

| name         = Autonomist Republican Union Party
| native_name  = Partido de Unión Republicana Autonomista
| leader       = Vicente Blasco Ibáñez
| foundation   =
| dissolved    =
| predecessor  = Republican Union
| successor    =
| merged       =
| ideology     = RepublicanismBlasquism
| position     = Centre-left (1908-1931)Centre-right (1931-1936)
| country      = Spain
}}
The Autonomist Republican Union Party (, PURA) was a Spanish republican party based in Valencia and founded in 1908 by Vicente Blasco Ibáñez.
